title: Question 1
question: What is the ideal distance in the PA (postero-anterior) incidence, reducing the magnification and improving the sharpness?

title: Question 2
question: In obtaining the profile radiography, what is the main purpose of positioning the left side of the chest against the chassis?

options.label: Better visualization of the skeletal structure.
Better visualization of nodules.
Reduce magnification and increase the sharpness of the heart and mediastinum.
There is no convention.

title: Question 3
question: In the FAMEMA-ECCLISSATO method, what is the interpretation sequence?

options.label: skeletal structure; soft parts; pleural space and domes; lung and hilum; heart and mediastinum.
soft parts; skeletal structure; pleural space and domes; lung and hilum; heart and mediastinum.
heart and mediastinum; soft parts; skeletal structure; pleural space and domes; lung and hilum;
pleural space and domes; heart and mediastinum; soft parts; skeletal structure; lung and hilum;

title: Question 4
question: The Bochdalek hernia:

options.label: is a congenital defect located in the posterolateral portion of the diaphragm due to incomplete obliteration of the foramen situated in this region.
is a congenital defect located in the anterior portion of the diaphragm due to incomplete obliteration of the foramen situated in this region.
is a congenital defect located in the medial portion of the diaphragm due to incomplete obliteration of foramen located in this region.
is a congenital defect located in the posteromedial portion of the diaphragm due to incomplete obliteration of the foramen situated in this region.

caption: Rev. Col. Bras. Cir. vol.35 no.1 Rio de Janeiro Jan./Feb. 2008.

options.label: Less than 0.5.
Greater than 0.5.
Between 0.5-0.6.
Less than 0.7.

title: Question 6
question: In the Morgagni hernia there is the passage of structures and / or abdominal viscera through:

options.label: Foramen posterolateral of Larrey.
Morgani Medial Hiatus.
Weil's Side Space.
Sternocostal trine (Morgagni foramen / Larrey space).

caption: Rev Imagem 2007;29(2):67–70 Hérnia de Morgagni: relato de caso / Freitas LF et al.

options.label: The middle lobe of the upper lobe.
The lower lobe of the superior.
The lower lobe of the middle and upper lobe.
The upper lobe.

title: Question 8
question: The mediastinum according to the ITMIG group is divided into:

options.label: Vascular, medial and posterior.
Visceral, vertebral and neural.
Pre-vascular, visceral and paravertebral.
Paravertebral, anterior and posterior visceral.

title: Question 9
question: The Artery of Adamkiewicz is:

options.label: the largest anterior radiculomedullary artery that reaches the anterior spinal artery, being responsible for the blood supply of up to two thirds distal to the spinal cord.
a tributary artery of the internal mammary.
the largest anterior artery that irrigates the phrenic musculature.
synonymous with the innominate artery.

caption: PIOLA, Flávio Porto Franco. Avaliação da artéria de Adamkiewicz através da angiotomografia computadorizada coronariana de múltiplos detectores acoplado ao eletrocardiograma. 2017. Dissertação (Mestrado em Ortopedia,Traumatologia e Reabilitação) - Faculdade de Medicina de Ribeirão Preto, Universidade de São Paulo, Ribeirão Preto, 2017. doi:10.11606/D.17.2017.tde-07062017-151417. Acesso em: 2018-12-17.

options.label: The x-rays are vertical and the decubitus is horizontal.
The lateral decubitus is used to the side to be studied with horizontal x-rays.
The x-rays are horizontal and the decubitus is always right lateral.
The x-rays are vertical and the decubitus is vertical.
